channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2024070068
item.description:
Report X-2024070068

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-03T15:13:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-20
  • City: MADISON HEIGHTS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN MADISON HEIGHTS, MICHIGAN, ONE AIR PACKAGE WAS INSPECTED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED ONE MARZ WHIP NITROUS OXIDE CHARGER. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM MICHIGAN USING UPS ACCOUNT 2451R8, AMAZON MFN, 333 108TH AVE NE, BELLEVUE WA 98004-5703.

item.title: Report X-2024070043
item.description:
Report X-2024070043

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-03T15:13:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-20
  • City: MADISON HEIGHTS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN MADISON HEIGHTS, MICHIGAN, PACKAGES FROM A NEW ACCOUNT WERE INSPECTED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED MARZ MAX PLUS NITROUS OXIDE FOAMING WHIPPED CREAM CHARGERS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON EITHER OUTER BOX. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBER TO ANOTHER CONSIGNEE IN THE USA IS 1ZJ14H000129003322. THE PACKAGES WERE SHIPPED FROM MICHIGAN USING UPS ACCOUNT J14H00, AMAZONMARKETPLACE, 43763 VAN DYKE AVE, STERLING HEIGHTS MI 48314. THESE PACKAGES HAVE NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report E-2024060692
item.description:
Report E-2024060692

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-03T15:13:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-16
  • City: BYRON CENTER
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately 15 gallons of material released from one (1) 55-gallon metal drum due to a forklift puncture. The released material impacted the trailer floor. Dayton Freight personnel deployed granular absorbents to the impacted area and containerized the cleanup debris and the damaged drum into one (1) 65-gallon metal drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freightâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024061747
item.description:
Report X-2024061747

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-01T15:12:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-19
  • City: WYOMING
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED DUE TO IMPROPPER PACKAGING. THE PACKAGE WAS 26LBS AND PLACED INTO A BUBBLE MAILER FOR SHIPPING THAT COULD ONLY HOLD 1LB OF MATERIAL. THE PACKAGE WAS ALSO DISCOVERED TO BE AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT BY THE HAZMAT AUDITOR SINCE THE PACKAGE WAS NOT LABLED WITH THE PROPER HAZMAT LABELS ON THE EXTERIOR PACKAGING.

item.title: Report X-2024061640
item.description:
Report X-2024061640

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-28T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-18
  • City: MADISON HEIGHTS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE MARKED PROPERLY, DIAMOND LABEL CORROSIVE 8- UN3264 CORROSIVE LIQUID, ACIDIC, INORGANIC, N.O.S. (SULFAMIC ACID). CONTENTS WAS 4-1 GALLONS OF ZEP(CALCIUM LIME RUST STAIN REMOVER). THE BOTTLES CAPS WERE LOOSE CAUSING LEAKAGE. THE CAPS WERE TIGHTENED ON ALL 4 BOTTLES. THEN WERE PLACED IN GREEN DMP BAG WITH WET CARDBOARD NAPKINS 5 INCHES OF ZEP ZORBENT AND SODIUM BICARBONATE TO NEUTRALIZE SPILL TO PH RANGE 6-9. AWAITING FURTHER INSTRUCTION FOR DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report X-2024061512
item.description:
Report X-2024061512

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-27T15:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-17
  • City: DETROIT
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: NORFOLK SOUTHERN
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 9700
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dolly on trailer that container was placed became damaged. Investigation into that damage is still under investigation. With damage to the Dolly being present, when the driver attempted to unhook from the trailer, the trailer proceeded to roll onto side. Totes with product appeared to not be secured per AAR guidelines, and 1 tote was damaged & leaked.
